briefdescription.para: Ordinary feed backward pass of a neural network, calculating the function f(x) by propagating x backwards trough f.

detaileddescription.para: Using the results from the feed forward pass.

briefdescription.para: Calculate the gradient using the output delta and the input activation.

parameterdescription.para: The input data used for evaluating specified function.

briefdescription.para: Get the number of attention heads.
Modify the number of attention heads.
Get the size of the weights.
Multihead Attention allows the model to jointly attend to information from different representation subspaces at different positions.

detaileddescription.para: With a single attention head, averaging inhibits this. [arxiv.org:1706.03762v5]
The MultiheadAttention class takes concatenated form of query, key and value. The query, key and value are concatenated into single matrix and fed to the Forward function as input.

The query, key and value are matrices of shapes (embedDim * tgtSeqLen, batchSize), (embedDim * srcSeqLen, batchSize) and (embedDim * srcSeqLen, batchSize) respectively. The output is a matrix of shape (embedDim * tgtSeqLen, batchSize). The embeddings are stored consequently.

parameterdescription.para: Type of the input data (arma::colvec, arma::mat, arma::sp_mat or arma::cube).
Type of the output data (arma::colvec, arma::mat, arma::sp_mat or arma::cube).
Type of the regularizer to be used.
